DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate patient quality-of-life ( QOL ) inguinal hernia repair . `` Carolinas Comfort Scale '' ( CCS ) assessment hold regular interval . The secondary objective study follow short-term long-term study-related complications/adverse event .
